metadata.title: CVE-2017-2661 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
ClusterLabs pcs before version 0.9.157 is vulnerable to a cross-sitescripting vulnerability due to improper validation of Node name field whencreating new cluster or adding existing cluster.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2661` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pcs - 0.9.164-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcs package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.164-1').
